TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CanExecuteChangedEventManager extends System.Windows.WeakEventManager

Docs.summary: Provides a implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For information about how to use this class, see “Using an Existing Weak Event Manager Class“ in[Weak Event Patterns](../Topic/Weak%20Event%20Patterns.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void AddHandler (System.Windows.Input.ICommand source, EventHandler<EventArgs> handler);
.method public static hidebysig void AddHandler(class System.Windows.Input.ICommand source, class System.EventHandler`1<class System.EventArgs> handler) cil managed

Docs.param: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified delegate as an event handler of the specified source.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool Purge (object source, object data, bool purgeAll);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool Purge(object source, object data, bool purgeAll) cil managed

Docs.param: The source for events being listened to.
The data to check. This object is expected to be a <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList> implementation.
to stop listening to `source`, and completely remove all entries from `data`.
Docs.summary: Removes inactive listener entries from the data list for the provided source.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RemoveHandler (System.Windows.Input.ICommand source, EventHandler<EventArgs> handler);
.method public static hidebysig void RemoveHandler(class System.Windows.Input.ICommand source, class System.EventHandler`1<class System.EventArgs> handler) cil managed

Docs.param: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void StartListening(object source) cil managed

Docs.summary: Begins listening for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the specified source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void StopListening(object source) cil managed

Docs.param: The source object to stop listening for.
Docs.summary: Stops listening for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the specified source.
